import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; function Navbar() { // Check if the user is logged in as an admin const isAdmin = sessionStorage.getItem('admin_id'); return (
Log In Contacts Page About us Parks Rangers Hotels {isAdmin && ( // Render the "Dashboard" link only if the user is an admin <> Add Hotel Add Park Add Rangers Add Rangers )}
); } export default Navbar;
